item.title: Everything Broken On The 66 Year Old Airplane
item.description: Restoring an aging aircraft isn’t easy — here’s what we found when we began working on this 66-year-old plane.

media:content.media:title: Everything Broken On The 66 Year Old Airplane
media:content.media:description: Restoring an aging aircraft isn’t easy — here’s what we found when we began working on this 66-year-old plane.

item.title: Sooo... I Bought A Helicopter
item.description: A dream takes flight! Follow the journey of buying and inspecting a helicopter — from first impressions to future plans.

item.title: Visiting the World's Largest Wood Propeller Factory!
item.description: Take a rare look inside the world’s biggest wood propeller factory and see how craftsmanship keeps aviation history alive.

item.title: Diesel Truck or Private Jet for $75k?
item.description: A surprising comparison between two big-ticket purchases — a powerful diesel truck or a private jet — exploring what $75K can really get you.

item.title: Failure in the Silver Bullet
item.description: Mid-flight trouble strikes the “Silver Bullet.” Follow the tense moments as the pilot reacts fast to handle a sudden in-air failure safely.

item.title: Unbelievable Deal: Real Fighter Jet for $60K!
item.description: An aviation enthusiast lands the deal of a lifetime — a genuine fighter jet for just $60,000. Here’s how the purchase came together and what it takes to restore it.

item.title: Was Buying This Broken Wooden P51 a Mistake?��
item.description: Was Buying This Broken Wooden P51 a Mistake?��

item.title: Can a 250 mph Museum Plane Fly Again After 20 Years?
item.description: After 20 years on display, this classic aircraft faces a big question — can it return to the skies once more?

item.title: I Surprised My Friend With Free Airplane
item.description: A dream come true — watch the moment a friend receives the ultimate surprise gift: their very own airplane.

item.title: Pixar Plane Brought to Life
item.description: A real-life version of a beloved Pixar plane takes flight — see how creativity and engineering make movie magic come true.

item.title: I Crashed The Elvis Jet
item.description: A rare look inside the legendary Elvis jet’s rough landing and the effort to restore it to its former glory.

item.title: Driving the Free Abandoned RV Across Florida
item.description: Follow the journey of restoring and driving a once-abandoned RV across Florida, turning a forgotten vehicle into a road trip adventure.

item.title: Inside Mötley Crüe’s Abandoned Private Jet
item.description: Take a rare look inside the band Mötley Crüe’s abandoned private jet — a glimpse into rock history left frozen in time.

item.title: Aztec Twin-Turbo: Will It Start After 7 Years?!
item.description: After seven years of sitting idle, a twin-turbo Aztec is fired up again — will it start and run like it used to?

item.title: Sometimes Things Don’t Turn Out as Planned
item.description: A routine job takes an unexpected turn, proving that even with the best preparation, surprises can still happen in the shop.

item.title: Homemade P-51 Mustang Flies Again
item.description: After years of sitting idle, a handcrafted P-51 Mustang roars back to life as it’s started and tested for the first time in years.

item.title: Nearly Calling 911 After Selling My Plane
item.description: A routine aircraft sale takes a tense turn when unexpected issues arise — leading to a moment where calling for help seemed inevitable.

item.title: 100-Year-Old Airplane Will It Start After Years?
item.description: A century-old airplane is brought back to life after years of inactivity — can it still start and take to the skies once more?

item.title: The Airplane That Refuses to Quit!
item.description: A look back at the disappearance of Sarah Payne, whose tragic case in the UK led to lasting changes in child protection laws.

item.title: I Got Scammed Out of $41,000 On NASA Jet!
item.description: A costly lesson unfolds after a $41,000 deal for a NASA jet turns out to be a scam — revealing how easily passion projects can go wrong.
